title: Nerf Zed
body:
He takes no skill and has no counterplay early game.
................................................^Which is what Cassio was reworked for.

replies.body:
Zed actually takes quite a bit of skill to play well. Learn your matchups.
He's not overpowered in anyway, as there is plenty of counterplay.

> Zed actually takes quite a bit of skill to play well. Learn your matchups.
> He's not overpowered in anyway, as there is plenty of counterplay.

No he doesn't, just mash keys and press r to dodge everything.
if anything champs like syndra, fizz, kat, akali, ww, malz should be nerfed. they take alot less skill.

> if anything champs like syndra, fizz, kat, akali, ww, malz should be nerfed. they take alot less skill.

Kat and Akali have a high skill cap, Zed doesn't.

**How to beat {{champion:238}}  in Lane 101.
**

**Option 1**
Dodge W+E+Q combo
= Zed no energy
= Go ham on him
*Rinse and repeat.*

**Option 2**
Play {{champion:10}} 

**Conclusion**
Both these methods will lead to the timely demise of Zed
Fizz works too, so does Zhonyas.

He isn't anything special till 6, by 6 you have a seekers arm guard? and then on top of that play ANY champion that can simply dash away or cc him when he ults. e.g LISSANDRA (zed ults zed freezes), Ahri Zed ults you charm, miss charm? ult away. Leblanc, jump away, she also destroys him pre 6 and really the entire game, kayle obviously, cass zed ults cass ults, Talon, just straight up better trading, zed ults talon ults talon waits till mark off kills zed, AP Sej mid, Zed ults Sej ults dead Zed :-), Syndra, knock back/stun zed ult zed, should easily go one for one at worst assuming you have combo up and arent terrible at syndra, Fizz, put fish where hes gonna pop up shadow, e to his r he will be so slow from fish youll land your e even with his r dash he w's? q ded zed.

I know this is troll bait btw, also cass no skill and had no counterplay? wut.

> He isn't anything special till 6, by 6 you have a seekers arm guard? and then on top of that play ANY champion that can simply dash away or cc him when he ults. e.g LISSANDRA (zed ults zed freezes), Ahri Zed ults you charm, miss charm? ult away. Leblanc, jump away, she also destroys him pre 6 and really the entire game, kayle obviously, cass zed ults cass ults, Talon, just straight up better trading, zed ults talon ults talon waits till mark off kills zed, AP Sej mid, Zed ults Sej ults dead Zed :-), Syndra, knock back/stun zed ult zed, should easily go one for one at worst assuming you have combo up and arent terrible at syndra, Fizz, put fish where hes gonna pop up shadow, e to his r he will be so slow from fish youll land your e even with his r dash he w's? q ded zed.
> 
> I know this is troll bait btw, also cass no skill and had no counterplay? wut.

Holy hell, do you know what a comma is? Please use them as your post was absolute hell to read.
Also Cassio had zero early game counterplay, if she wanted you dead you'd die. Simple.
